nodes.text: Star Wars Episode I: Junior Jedi Training Manual

Star Wars Episode I: Junior Jedi Training Manual was a book-and-record published by Kid Rhino. It was the in-universe handbook for the "Junior Jedi," explaining the different aspects of becoming a Jedi Knight. It consisted of a 24-page, full-color book including photos from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace a listen-and-read-along cassette. A limited edition with a collectible Jedi badge was also released.
